languages.text: "После заседания перед Дворцом Правосудия состоится публичная казнь: Леди Моллес-Секандас, оба ее мужа, дети и твой клерк — все люди, что отняли мое драгоценное время. Трупы снимать запрещаю — пусть будут предупреждением всем, кто вздумает вновь отвлечь меня".
languages.translation_comment:
дать очков еретика
Стартует этюд VC_MollesAllDead
Никого не казним
Весы в равновесии

дать очков еретика
Стартует этюд VC_MollesAllDead
Никого не казним
Весы в равновесии

languages.text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."
languages.original_text: "После заседания перед Дворцом Правосудия состоится публичная казнь: Леди Моллес-Секандас, оба ее мужа, дети и твой клерк — все люди, что отняли мое драгоценное время. Трупы снимать запрещаю — пусть будут предупреждением всем, кто вздумает вновь отвлечь меня".

traits.locale_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

"After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

"After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

languages.text: "Nach dieser Sitzung werden vor dem Justizpalast Lady Molles-Secundas, ihre beiden Ehemänner, die Kinder und Euer Beamter öffentlich hingerichtet. Sie haben alle meine kostbare Zeit vergeudet. Überdies untersage ich die Entfernung der Leichen. Sie sollen als Warnung dienen, mich nicht zu langweilen."
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: "Nach dieser Sitzung werden vor dem Justizpalast Lady Molles-Secundas, ihre beiden Ehemänner, die Kinder und Euer Beamter öffentlich hingerichtet. Sie haben alle meine kostbare Zeit vergeudet. Überdies untersage ich die Entfernung der Leichen. Sie sollen als Warnung dienen, mich nicht zu langweilen."

languages.text: « À l'issue de cette audience, une exécution publique aura lieu devant le palais de justice : celle de dame Molles-Secundas, ainsi que de ses deux époux, de ses enfants et de votre greffier. Vous m'avez fait perdre un temps précieux, tous autant que vous êtes. Interdiction formelle d'enlever les corps, qu'ils restent exposés aux yeux de tous en guise d'avertissement pour quiconque serait tenté d'en faire autant. »
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: « À l'issue de cette audience, une exécution publique aura lieu devant le palais de justice : celle de dame Molles-Secundas, ainsi que de ses deux époux, de ses enfants et de votre greffier. Vous m'avez fait perdre un temps précieux, tous autant que vous êtes. Interdiction formelle d'enlever les corps, qu'ils restent exposés aux yeux de tous en guise d'avertissement pour quiconque serait tenté d'en faire autant. »

languages.text: “等这次审判结束之后，我命令在正义大殿前进行公开处决。处决的犯人包括莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人、她的两个丈夫、两个孩子、还有你手下那个文员，你们浪费了我的宝贵时间。我禁止任何人把他们的尸体取下来，如果再有人打算浪费我的时间，那些死人就是给他们的警告。”
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: “等这次审判结束之后，我命令在正义大殿前进行公开处决。处决的犯人包括莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人、她的两个丈夫、两个孩子、还有你手下那个文员，你们浪费了我的宝贵时间。我禁止任何人把他们的尸体取下来，如果再有人打算浪费我的时间，那些死人就是给他们的警告。”

languages.text: «Cuando se levante esta sesión, se celebrará una ejecución pública frente al Palacio de la Justicia: lady Molles-Secundas, sus dos maridos, sus hijos y el funcionario. Todos cuantos han malgastado mi preciado tiempo. Prohíbo que se bajen los cuerpos; que sirvan de advertencia para quienes pretendan distraerme».
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando se levante esta sesión, se celebrará una ejecución pública frente al Palacio de la Justicia: lady Molles-Secundas, sus dos maridos, sus hijos y el funcionario. Todos cuantos han malgastado mi preciado tiempo. Prohíbo que se bajen los cuerpos; que sirvan de advertencia para quienes pretendan distraerme».

languages.text: 「この審問が終わり次第、司法宮の前にて公開処刑を行う。処刑されるのは、レディ・モレス・セクンダスと二人の夫、子供たち、そして君の事務員だ。{mf|俺|私}の貴重な時間を無駄にした者たち全員だ。遺体を下ろすことは禁ずる。それらが再び{mf|俺|私}の気を散らそうとする者への警告とする」
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: 「この審問が終わり次第、司法宮の前にて公開処刑を行う。処刑されるのは、レディ・モレス・セクンダスと二人の夫、子供たち、そして君の事務員だ。{mf|俺|私}の貴重な時間を無駄にした者たち全員だ。遺体を下ろすことは禁ずる。それらが再び{mf|俺|私}の気を散らそうとする者への警告とする」

languages.text: "Duruşma sonunda Leydi Molles-Secundas, iki kocası, çocukları ve sizin kâtip... Değerli vaktimi harcayan kim varsa Adalet Sarayı önünde halka açık şekilde idam edilecek. Cesetleri de orada kalacak, indirilmeyecek! Beni rahatsız etmeyi aklından geçiren olursa baksın, ibret alsın!"
languages.original_text: "After this session ends, a public execution will be held in front of the Palace of Justice: that of Lady Molles-Secundas, both her husbands, the children, and your clerk. All of you who have wasted my precious time. I forbid taking down the bodies; let them be a warning, should anyone presume to distract me again."

traits.locale_text: "Duruşma sonunda Leydi Molles-Secundas, iki kocası, çocukları ve sizin kâtip... Değerli vaktimi harcayan kim varsa Adalet Sarayı önünde halka açık şekilde idam edilecek. Cesetleri de orada kalacak, indirilmeyecek! Beni rahatsız etmeyi aklından geçiren olursa baksın, ibret alsın!"
